alert.note: Alert for Logan; Miami; Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 13 at 7:46PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SNOW SHOWER WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SHELBY, WEST CENTRAL LOGAN AND NORTHEASTERN MIAMI COUNTIES THROUGH 830 PM EST... At 745 PM EST, a snow shower was located near Sidney, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Rapidly changing visibility and up to half an inch of snow accumulation. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Driving conditions may change quickly. Slick roads are possible. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Piqua, Newport, Anna, Jackson Center, Botkins, Hardin, Russia, Fletcher, Port Jefferson, Casstown, Lockington, Montra, Polo, Newbern, Ballou, Plattsville, Maplewood, Farrington and Swanders. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 78 and 105.
info.instruction: Exercise extra caution while traveling. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
